text:
got it.

(probably) because a dnd_section, _column, and _row automatically get assigned classes when they render, it looks like thereâ€™s no way to put classes on them.

it looks like the best you can do is either put a class on the dnd_area that contains them (you can have multiple dnd_areas on a page), or insert your own wrapper inside the column or row.
can you share me screenshot please how i can you multipal dnd_area
